title.rendered: Tips To Help Your Business Grow And Compete With Bigger Players Using Social

content.rendered:
“Tips To Help Your Business Grow And Compete With Bigger Players Using Social”

 

The prominent online publication – Silicon India Magazine – has featured Digiperform in the June edition, by the editor Deepshikha Singh.

About the Magazine: SiliconIndia is an international platform launched as a print magazine from New York, the USA on August 15, 1997. The platform provides a trustworthy and knowledgeable media platform for CXOs and CIOs in the enterprise domain to share their insights, which in turn will help technology and business leaders with analysis on information technology trends and give a better understanding of the role that enterprise solutions play in achieving business goals.

The publication has featured the bylined article by Vaibhav Vats, Co-Founder of Digiperform, under the headline “Tips To Help Your Business Grow And Compete With Bigger Players Using Social” in the ‘CXO Insights’ section of the magazine.

 

Coverage Details:

 

Headline – Tips To Help Business Grow And Compete With Bigger Players Using Social

Publication– Silicon India Magazine

Issue – June 2018

Page ​– 18-19

Edition– India & The US

Link–https://www.siliconindiamagazine.com/magazine/biometric-and-access-control-and-digital-signature-special-june-2018/
